para: Copy a &layer; within the &layerset; currently being edited in the &layereditor;. The &layer; and its are duplicated, and the new &layer; is selected in the &layereditor;.

When using the GUI it's often convenient to copy a &layer; and then modify it. This generates a Copy_Method command followed by a Replace_Method command. In scripts this is sort of silly -- a single Add_Method command would suffice. However, &oof2; log files have to follow the sequence of events from the GUI, so they will contain a Copy_Method/Replace_Method pair.
